g.text: try to connect with the sensors
Get the status and power of sensors
[2a: The system fails to receive the response from sensors.]
try to connect with the sensors
try to connect with the sensors
[Every sensor succeeds to response to the system]
Get the status and power of sensors
[2a.2: Some sensor fails to response for three times.]
[5a: The server can not receive the response from the system.]
Server can not receive the response
try to connect with the sensors
[The server receives the response from the system.]
[The server fails to receive the response from the system.]
